content: 72 sts place marker and join to start working in the round work k2 p2 ribbing for 12 15 rounds leg setup change to smaller needles and work next 2 rounds as follows increase round * k2 m1 k6 m1 k4 repeat from * to end now you have 70 84 sts on the needles then knit one round leg start working the leg chart repeat each chart line 5 6 times to complete one round on your needles * work the 14 pattern rounds once then remove the stitch marker k7 replace stitch marker this shifts the beginning of the round by half a repeat to the left then repeat from * 3 times more i e 4 times 14 pattern rounds all together including 4 times k7 leg chart ©caoua coffee 2016 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved albert de moncerf v 1 page 2/5 albert de moncerf socks - by caoua coffee set-up for heel flap having finished the 4 times 14 =56 rounds of pattern not forgetting to k7 after the last round your beginning of the round should now be 28 sts to the left from where you started after cast-on now put the next 35 42 sts on hold they will be worked later for instep then turn your sock so ws is facing you and work the following 2 row once for smaller size only ws sl yf k2 sl yf p2tog k2 sl yf three times sl yf k2 sl yf twice turn your work rs k1 p2 k1 eight times for larger size only ws sl yf k2 sl yf p2tog k2 sl yf sl yf k2 p2tog tree times turn your work rs sl yb * p2 k2 repeat from * to 3 sts before end p2 k1 continue for both sizes the heel is worked over the 32 36 sts you have still on the needles hold your sock so ws is facing you and start working the heel flap heel flap ws * sl yf k2 sl yf repeat from * to end turn rs * k1 p2 k1 repeat from * to end turn work these 2 row 16 18 times all together that is 32 36 row total hint if you lost count on how many row you did on the heel flap just count the strands caused by the slipped stitches on the wrong side of the flap after the last rs row you should have 17 19 row with strands one from the set-up plus 16 18 from the heel flap row turn heel ws sl yf p18 20 p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb k7 7 ssk k1 turn ws sl yf purl to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb knit to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat these last 2 row until all sts have been worked don t turn after last rs row now 20 22 heel sts remain gusset setup
